mapper.select: SELECT id, pw, name, email, nickname, region1, region2, manner, profile_img AS fileName, created_at FROM MEMBERS WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, pw, name, email, nickname, region1, region2, manner, profile_img AS fileName, created_at FROM MEMBERS WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS(id, pw, name, nickname, email, region1, profile_img) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{region1}, #{fileName})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET pw = #{pw}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, region1 = #{region1}, profile_img = #{fileName} WHERE id = #{id}
